conbody.p: At prescribed in 1516.307, insert the following contract clause in cost-reimbursement contracts when an anticipatory cost letter has been issued on the project. The beginning dates and the not-to-exceed amount to be inserted in the clause should be those in the anticipatory cost letter.
The Contractor is entitled to reimbursement for allowable, allocable costs incurred during the period of __________________ to the award date of this contract in an amount not to exceed
